bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Miguel Roldan, December 24, 1953

div1.p: Hench is sending Roldan his two articles on the conquest of yellow fever as well as a reprint on cortisone. He informs Roldan he received the Finlay Medal.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Miguel Roldan, December 24, 1953
div1.opener:
December 24, 1953
Mr. Miguel Roldan
2189, Drawer B
Stormville, New York
My dear Mr. Roldan:
div1.p:
Your letter to the Mayo Clinic has been referred
to me for reply.

I am sending you two little articles on my
study of the conquest of yellow fever. You
ask something about my recent work with cortisone.
I enclose a reprint on that also.

Yes, I had the great honor to receive the
Carlos Finlay Medal in Havana last year. I
have many Cuban friends and hope to visit
there again next month.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, P. S. Hench, M.D. PSH:alc
